summary: A dishonest mayor and powerful criminal dominate a small western town. But when the town's sheriff dies under mysterious circumstances, Tom Destry, son of a famed gunman, is called in to put an end to the corruption.
cast: Audie Murphy|Mari Blanchard|Lyle Bettger|Thomas Mitchell|Edgar Buchanan|Lori Nelson|Wallace Ford|Mary Wickes|Alan Hale Jr.|George Wallace|Richard Reeves|Walter Baldwin|Lee Aaker|Anthony Lawrence|Frank Richards|Trevor Bardette|Ralph Peters|John Doucette|Emile Avery|Walter Bacon|Sam Bagley|John Barton|Oscar Blank|Wag Blesing|Billy Bletcher|Phil Bloom|Stanley Blystone|Jerry Brown|Bob Burns|Forest Burns|Wayne Burson|Nora Bush|Fred Carson|John Conde|Heinie Conklin|Bing Conley|Frank Cordell|Anne Cornwall|Jack Davidson|Tex Driscoll|Billy Engle|Franklyn Farnum|Geraldine Farnum|Mabel Forrest|Herb Golden|Dick Gordon|Peggy Gordon|Kit Guard|Chuck Hamilton|Harry Harris|Jimmy Hawkins|Marcoreta Hellman|Harry Hines|Don House|George Huggins|Jack Kenny|Donald Kerr|Ann Kunde|Lucille La Marr|Ethan Laidlaw|Rex Lease|David Ledner|Dale Logue|Jean Mahoney|Philo McCullough|Clyde McLeod|Frank Mills|Monte Montague|Charles Morton|Jack Mower|William H. O'Brien|Arvo Ojala|Frances Osborne|Bob Perry|Charles Perry|Joe Phillips|Edna Ryan|Cap Somers|Ray Spiker|Charles Sullivan|Harry Tenbrook|Bob Terhune|Larri Thomas|Jack Tornek|Buddy Van Horn|Sailor Vincent|Fred Weller|Henry Wills
title: Honor y venganza
